Line.Text: V FARE BASIS BK FARE TRAVEL-TICKET AP MINMAX RTG
FROM-HAN TO-SGN CXR-VN TVL-30AUG21 RULE-VND1 TPFDRPV/918
FARE BASIS-EAPVNF SPECIAL FARE DIS-E VENDOR-ATP

Paragraph.Title: RULE APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
Paragraph.Text: NOTE - THE FOLLOWING TEXT IS INFORMATIONAL AND NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING. VIETNAM AIRLINES ECONOMY FARES APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN VIET NAM. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS, WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT, WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIER'S BEST JUDGEMENT.

Paragraph.Title: ADVANCE RESERVATIONS/TICKETING
Paragraph.Text: CONFIRMED RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. TICKETING ON EACH TRIP MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 12 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE OR AT LEAST 1 DAY BEFORE DEPARTURE WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING. - GO-SHOW - CONTACT VN OFFICE FOR DETAILS.

Paragraph.Title: STOPOVERS
Paragraph.Text: UNLIMITED FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT.

Paragraph.Title: TRANSFERS
Paragraph.Text: UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT. FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

Paragraph.Title: COMBINATIONS
Paragraph.Text: SINGLE/DOUBLE OPEN JAWS NOT PERMITTED. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMBINATIONS. PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY -VNF TYPE FARES FOR CARRIER VN IN IN THIS RULE AND TARIFF OR RULE VND4 IN TARIFF FBRA3P - WITHIN AREA 3. ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH VN FARES -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS -TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS WITH VN FARES. PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY -VNF TYPE FARES FOR CARRIER VN IN IN THIS RULE AND TARIFF OR RULE VND4 IN TARIFF FBRA3P - WITHIN AREA 3.

Paragraph.Title: SALES RESTRICTIONS
Paragraph.Text: FOOTNOTE RULE TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 01APR20. FARE RULE TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF VN OR 1S AND MAY NOT BE SOLD IN CSJ/IZV/GYF/LZT/JND/JSF/HBN/PZM/IQR/ IZW/JNE/JKJ/HOO/JKY/IQU/KXJ/JNF/LJP/KON/JNT/IRU/GYH/ IQG/FJCSW/GXW/KZJ/JNC/JNF. AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN VIET NAM.

Paragraph.Title: PENALTIES
Paragraph.Text: CANCELLATIONS ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. CHANGES BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE VND 600000. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING. - BEFORE DEPARTURE IS DEFINED AS BEFORE TICKETED FLIGHT DATE. AFTER DEPARTURE CHANGES NOT PERMITTED. NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING. - AFTER DEPARTURE IS DEFINED AS ON/AFTER TICKETED FLIGHT DATE NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING. WHEN NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED AND THE APPLICABLE CHANGE FEE WILL APPLY.

Paragraph.Title: HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
Paragraph.Text: THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR STOPOVERS. AND - THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR CONNECTIONS.

Paragraph.Title: TICKET ENDORSEMENTS
Paragraph.Text: THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NON-END.RESTRICT MAY APPLY - AND - CONTACT B4 DEPT FOR CHANGE - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

Paragraph.Title: CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
Paragraph.Text: CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 90 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT APPLIED. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 18 OR OLDER. OR - 1ST INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN AND PERCENT APPLIED. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 18 OR OLDER.

Paragraph.Title: VISIT ANOTHER COUNTRY
Paragraph.Text: NO VISIT ANOTHER COUNTRY PROVISIONS APPLY.

Paragraph.Title: VOLUNTARY CHANGES
Paragraph.Text: ENTER RD*31 OR RDLINE NUM*31 FOR VOLUNTARY CHGS.

Paragraph.Title: VOLUNTARY REFUNDS
Paragraph.Text: CHECK CATEGORY 16 OR CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS.
